overview: When I...get that promotion at work'. 'When I...lose 7 pounds'. 'When I...build up my savings'. Adara has constantly put things off, and in a blink of an eye, time passes a lot faster than she expected. Thinking it's too late, to do all the things she saw in her future; Adara is offered the opportunity to be free of regret. However, it comes with a very high risk.  Could this wake up call, still be on time?
title: When I...
